# Autogenerated file, run build/tools/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

message(STATUS "Setting up module " system)

if (${IMP_USE_CUSTOM_CXX_FLAGS})
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS ${IMP_LIB_CXX_FLAGS})
endif()

FILE(GLOB gensources
     "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/system/*.cpp")

FILE(GLOB genheaders
     "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/include/IMP/system/*.h")

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH} ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH} ${BOOST.GRAPH_INCLUDE_PATH} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH} ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH} ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH} ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH} ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH} ${BOOST.GRAPH_LINK_PATH} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH} ${CGAL_LINK_PATH} ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH} ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})
add_definitions("-DIMPSYSTEM_EXPORT")

set(headers )

if(DEFINED IMP_system_IS_PER_CPP)
set(sources )

add_library(imp_system SHARED ${gensources} ${genheaders}
${headers} ${sources})
else()

add_library(imp_system SHARED ${gensources} ${genheaders}
${headers} ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/src/system_all.cpp)

endif()

target_link_libraries(imp_system
    ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY} ${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
    ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.GRAPH_LIBRARIES} ${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES} ${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES} ${CGAL_LIBRARIES} ${ANN_LIBRARIES}
  )

set(IMP_SYSTEM_LIBRARY imp_system CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
